title: Revert unauthorized UI changes and fix 9-ball revert guard

requirements.summary: Remove the unauthorized projected score display showing '+4' next to the current score
acceptanceCriteria: The '+4' projected score indicator is completely removed from the scoreboard
Only the actual current score is displayed during active gameplay
No projected total appears next to player scores

file_operations.description: Remove the projected score display logic that shows '+4' next to the current score in the scoreboard. Locate and delete any code that calculates or renders projected totals adjacent to player scores. Ensure only the actual current score is displayed without any projected additions.

requirements.summary: Remove the unauthorized live PPI calculation display showing 'PPI: 0.00 | Def: 0' during active gameplay
acceptanceCriteria: The live 'PPI: 0.00 | Def: 0' display is completely removed from the active game screen
PPI calculation only appears in the final match results summary
No real-time PPI updates during gameplay

file_operations.description: Remove all live PPI and defensive shot count display logic from the active gameplay screen. Delete any UI elements that show 'PPI: 0.00 | Def: 0' or similar real-time statistical calculations. Preserve PPI calculation logic that runs at match completion but remove any in-game display of these statistics.

requirements.summary: Fix the 9-ball revert guard condition to allow automatic dead ball revert when clicking the 9-ball
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the 9-ball when it is marked as dead automatically reverts it to unscored state
No guard condition blocks the automatic revert behavior for the 9-ball
The 9-ball behaves consistently with the approved revert logic

file_operations.description: Locate the guard condition that prevents the 9-ball from being automatically reverted when clicked in a dead state. Remove or adjust this guard to allow the 9-ball to revert to unscored state when clicked while marked as dead, matching the revert behavior of other balls. Ensure the fix does not affect the defensive button logic or dead ball styling already implemented.
